short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is built to adapt to the iOS 14 privacy settings, helps ShopBase sellers view real-time data on Facebook Ads Manager.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: In order to solve the data loss caused by the iOS 14 privacy settings, ShopBase merchants can use this application to match their real-time store order data with the corresponding campaign/adset/ad on their Facebook Ads Manager, so that find out how to optimize their advertising campaigns in a timely manner.
